content.prompt: The data from the temperature-controlled experimental plots can best be used to support which of the following conclusions about cicada development?

choices.label: Adult cicadas lay more eggs when the soil is warmer than when the soil is cooler.
Adult cicadas mate more frequently when the soil is warmer than when the soil is cooler.
Cicada nymphs grow larger in warmer soil than in cooler soil.
Cicada nymphs mature to adults faster in warmer soil than in cooler soil.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
